name: Fire in the Goal "轰个球"
description: Kick-butt weaponry now says hello to soccer! Demonstrate your sportsmanship and bring doom to your opponent on this splendid greenfield!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: i3 or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTS 250 or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: i5 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTS 650 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
